00033 typedef enum {

00053   FFS_REQUESTED_MEM_NOT_AVAILABLE,
00054   FFS_INVALID_NAME,

00056   FFS_OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED_ON_STATIC_FILE,

00058   FFS_NOT_A_FACTORY_DEFAULT_FILE,
